typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Period Date} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		Species as string,
		{Product Global Grade} as string,
		Currency as string,
		UOM as string,
		Market as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		Indicator as string,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		{Origin Port Country} as string,
		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,
		{Destination Port Country} as string,
		{Destination Port Region} as string,
		{Destination Port} as string,
		{Vessel Name} as string,
		Low as string,
		High as string,
		Average as string,
		Spot as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Product_Id as integer,
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Product_Global_Grade as string,
		Product_Desc as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Product_Id]\n      ,[Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Code]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE Product_Id != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimProductLkp
source(output(
		Species_ID as integer,
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_ID]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species_Group]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE [Species_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
source(output(
		Data_Source_Id as integer,
		Metric_Short_Name as string,
		Source_Name as string,
		Source_Type as string,
		Source_Link as string,
		Source_Data_Type as string,
		Data_Process_Type as string,
		Source_Status as string,
		Frequency as string,
		Confidence_Level as string,
		Person_Responsible as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Data_Source_Id]\n      ,[Metric_Short_Name]\n      ,[Source_Name]\n      ,[Source_Type]\n      ,[Source_Link]\n      ,[Source_Data_Type]\n      ,[Data_Process_Type]\n      ,[Source_Status]\n      ,[Frequency]\n      ,[Confidence_Level]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Data_Source]\nWHERE [Data_Source_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDataSource
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Type]\n      ,[Basis]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimTypePartial
source(output(
		Region_ID as integer,
		Country_Code as string,
		Country as string,
		Region_Code as string,
		Region as string,
		Port_Loc as string,
		Long as decimal(20,15),
		Lat as decimal(20,15)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Region_ID]\n      ,[Country_Code]\n      ,[Country]\n      ,[Region_Code]\n      ,[Region]\n      ,[Port_Loc]\n      ,[Long]\n      ,[Lat]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Region]\nWHERE [Region_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimRegion
source(output(
		Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Date]\nFROM [relational].[DateDimension]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDateDimension
source(output(
		UOM_ID as integer,
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [UOM_ID]\n      ,[UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]\nWHERE [UOM_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimUom
source(output(
		Delivery_Point_ID as integer,
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Delivery_Point_ID]\n      ,[Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]\nWHERE [Delivery_Point_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDeliveryPoint
source(output(
		Currency_ID as integer,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Currency_Name as string,
		Currency_Numeric_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Currency_ID]\n      ,[Currency_Code]\n      ,[Currency_Name]\n      ,[Currency_Numeric_Code]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Currency]\nWHERE [Currency_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimCurrency
source(output(
		Indicator_Id as integer,
		Indicator_Code as string,
		Indicator_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Indicator_Id]\n      ,[Indicator_Code]\n      ,[Indicator_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Indicator]\nWHERE [Indicator_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimIndicator
source(output(
		Type_ID as integer,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Type_ID]\n      ,[Type]\n      ,[Basis]\n      ,[Price_Point]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimType
DatamartDimProductLkp select(mapColumn(
		Product_Id_Lkp = Product_Id,
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Product_Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName,
		{Period Date} = toDate({Period Date}),
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Country, "Undefined"),
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Region, "Undefined")) ~> DataTransformation
RenameDestinationPortAddDP split(not(isNull(DateDimension_Date_Lkp)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_ID_Lkp = Species_ID,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimSpecies
LookupTypeDimensionPartial, SelectDimCurrencyLkp lookup(Currency == Currency_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimCurrency
DatamartDimDataSource select(mapColumn(
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp = Data_Source_Id,
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp = Metric_Short_Name,
		Source_Name_Lkp = Source_Name,
		Source_Type_Lkp = Source_Type,
		Source_Link_Lkp = Source_Link,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp = Source_Data_Type,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp = Data_Process_Type,
		Source_Status_Lkp = Source_Status,
		Frequency_Lkp = Frequency,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp = Confidence_Level,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp = Person_Responsible
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDataSourceLkp
DatamartDimTypePartial select(mapColumn(
		Type_Lkp = Type,
		Basis_Lkp = Basis
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTypePartialLkp
DatamartDimRegion select(mapColumn(
		Region_ID_Lkp = Region_ID,
		Country_Code_Lkp = Country_Code,
		Country_Lkp = Country,
		Region_Code_Lkp = Region_Code,
		Region_Lkp = Region,
		Port_Loc_Lkp = Port_Loc,
		Long_Lkp = Long,
		Lat_Lkp = Lat
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimRegionLkp
RelationalDateDimension select(mapColumn(
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp = Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDateDimensionLkp
DatamartDimUom select(mapColumn(
		UOM_ID_Lkp = UOM_ID,
		UOM_Name_Lkp = UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type_Lkp = UOM_Type,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Long_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimUomLkp
DatamartDimDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = Delivery_Point_ID,
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Desc,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Long_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliverPointLkp
DatamartDimCurrency select(mapColumn(
		Currency_ID_Lkp = Currency_ID,
		Currency_Code_Lkp = Currency_Code,
		Currency_Name_Lkp = Currency_Name,
		Currency_Numeric_Code_Lkp = Currency_Numeric_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimCurrencyLkp
DatamartDimIndicator select(mapColumn(
		Indicator_Id_Lkp = Indicator_Id,
		Indicator_Code_Lkp = Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc_Lkp = Indicator_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimIndicatorLkp
LookupDimSpecies, SelectDimProductLkp lookup({Product Global Grade} == Product_Global_Grade_Lkp
	&& Species_Code_Lkp == Product_Species_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimProduct
RenameRegionLkpAddCO, SelectDimDataSourceLkp lookup({Source Metric} == Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimDataSource
LookupDimDataSource, SelectDateDimensionLkp lookup({Period Date} == DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDateDimension
LookupDimCurrency, SelectDimUomLkp lookup(UOM == UOM_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimUom
LookupDimUom, SelectDimDeliverPointLkp lookup({Delivery Point} == Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimDeliveryPoint
LookupDimDeliveryPoint, SelectDimIndicatorLkp lookup(Indicator == Indicator_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimIndicator
LookupDimProduct, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup(Country_Redefined_For_Lkp == Country_Code_Lkp
	&& Region_Redefined_For_Lkp == Region_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimRegionUseCountryRegionKeys
RenameRegionLkpAddCR, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup(Country_Redefined_For_Lkp == Country_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimRegionUseCountryKey
LookupDimRegionUseCountryRegionKeys select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species,
		{Product Global Grade},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Species_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Lkp,
		Genus_Lkp,
		Species_Group_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Product_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Type_Lkp,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp,
		Product_Desc_Lkp,
		GL_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Species_Code_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CR = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CR = Country_Code_Lkp,
		Country_Lkp_CR = Country_Lkp,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CR = Region_Code_Lkp,
		Region_Lkp_CR = Region_Lkp,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CR = Port_Loc_Lkp,
		Long_Lkp_CR = Long_Lkp,
		Lat_Lkp_CR = Lat_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameRegionLkpAddCR
LookupDimRegionUseCountryKey select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species,
		{Product Global Grade},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Species_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Lkp,
		Genus_Lkp,
		Species_Group_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Product_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Type_Lkp,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp,
		Product_Desc_Lkp,
		GL_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Species_Code_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Lkp_CR,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CR,
		Long_Lkp_CR,
		Lat_Lkp_CR,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CO = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CO = Country_Code_Lkp,
		Country_Lkp_CO = Country_Lkp,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CO = Region_Code_Lkp,
		Region_Lkp_CO = Region_Lkp,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CO = Port_Loc_Lkp,
		Long_Lkp_CO = Long_Lkp,
		Lat_Lkp_CO = Lat_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameRegionLkpAddCO
LookupDimIndicator, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup({Origin Port Country} == Country_Code_Lkp
	&& {Destination Port Region} == Region_Code_Lkp
	&& {Origin Port} == Port_Loc_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOriginPort
LookupOriginPort select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species,
		{Product Global Grade},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Species_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Lkp,
		Genus_Lkp,
		Species_Group_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Product_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Type_Lkp,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp,
		Product_Desc_Lkp,
		GL_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Species_Code_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Lkp_CR,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CR,
		Long_Lkp_CR,
		Lat_Lkp_CR,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CO,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CO,
		Country_Lkp_CO,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CO,
		Region_Lkp_CO,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CO,
		Long_Lkp_CO,
		Lat_Lkp_CO,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
		Source_Name_Lkp,
		Source_Type_Lkp,
		Source_Link_Lkp,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp,
		Source_Status_Lkp,
		Frequency_Lkp,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp,
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Type_Lkp,
		Basis_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_Code_Lkp,
		Currency_Name_Lkp,
		Currency_Numeric_Code_Lkp,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		UOM_Name_Lkp,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp,
		UOM_Type_Lkp,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Indicator_Code_Lkp,
		Indicator_Desc_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Country_Code_Lkp_OP = Country_Code_Lkp,
		Country_Lkp_OP = Country_Lkp,
		Region_Code_Lkp_OP = Region_Code_Lkp,
		Region_Lkp_OP = Region_Lkp,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_OP = Port_Loc_Lkp,
		Long_Lkp_OP = Long_Lkp,
		Lat_Lkp_OP = Lat_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameOriginPortLkpColumnsAddOP
RenameOriginPortLkpColumnsAddOP, SelectDimRegionLkp lookup({Destination Port Country} == Country_Code_Lkp
	&& {Destination Port Region} == Region_Code_Lkp
	&& {Destination Port} == Port_Loc_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDestinationPort
LookupDestinationPort select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species,
		{Product Global Grade},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Species_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Lkp,
		Genus_Lkp,
		Species_Group_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Product_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Type_Lkp,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp,
		Product_Desc_Lkp,
		GL_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Species_Code_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Country_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CR,
		Region_Lkp_CR,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CR,
		Long_Lkp_CR,
		Lat_Lkp_CR,
		Region_ID_Lkp_CO,
		Country_Code_Lkp_CO,
		Country_Lkp_CO,
		Region_Code_Lkp_CO,
		Region_Lkp_CO,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_CO,
		Long_Lkp_CO,
		Lat_Lkp_CO,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
		Source_Name_Lkp,
		Source_Type_Lkp,
		Source_Link_Lkp,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp,
		Source_Status_Lkp,
		Frequency_Lkp,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp,
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Type_Lkp,
		Basis_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_Code_Lkp,
		Currency_Name_Lkp,
		Currency_Numeric_Code_Lkp,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		UOM_Name_Lkp,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp,
		UOM_Type_Lkp,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Indicator_Code_Lkp,
		Indicator_Desc_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Country_Code_Lkp_OP,
		Country_Lkp_OP,
		Region_Code_Lkp_OP,
		Region_Lkp_OP,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_OP,
		Long_Lkp_OP,
		Lat_Lkp_OP,
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Country_Code_Lkp_DP = Country_Code_Lkp,
		Country_Lkp_DP = Country_Lkp,
		Region_Code_Lkp_DP = Region_Code_Lkp,
		Region_Lkp_DP = Region_Lkp,
		Port_Loc_Lkp_DP = Port_Loc_Lkp,
		Long_Lkp_DP = Long_Lkp,
		Lat_Lkp_DP = Lat_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameDestinationPortAddDP
LookupDateDimension, SelectDimTypePartialLkp lookup(Type == Type_Lkp
	&& Basis == Basis_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTypeDimensionPartial
DataTransformation2 select(mapColumn(
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Type,
		Basis,
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		{Vessel Name},
		Comment,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Source_File
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(Region_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CR, Region_ID_Lkp_CO),
		Batch_ID = toString(Batch_ID)) ~> DataTransformation2
SelectRequiredColumns unpivot(output(
		Value_Type as string,
		Value as string
	),
	ungroupBy(DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Type,
		Basis,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		{Vessel Name},
		Comment,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot
DatamartDimType select(mapColumn(
		Type_ID_Lkp = Type_ID,
		Type_Lkp = Type,
		Basis_Lkp = Basis,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTypeLkp
Unpivot, SelectDimTypeLkp lookup(Type == Type_Lkp
	&& Basis == Basis_Lkp
	&& Value_Type == Price_Point_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimType
DataTransformation3 select(mapColumn(
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Type_ID_Lkp,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		{Vessel Name},
		Value,
		Comment,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
LookupDimType derive(Value = toDecimal(iifNull(Value, '0'),20,4),
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Species_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Species_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Product_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Product_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Type_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Type_ID_Lkp, -1),
		UOM_ID_Lkp = iifNull(UOM_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Currency_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Currency_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Indicator_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP, -1)) ~> DataTransformation3
SelectOutput sort(asc(DateDimension_Date_Lkp, true),
	asc(Type_ID_Lkp, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testMarketInfo.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp,
		Species_ID_Lkp,
		Product_Id_Lkp,
		Type_ID_Lkp,
		UOM_ID_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		{Vessel Name},
		Value,
		Comment,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
